title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 603.2 - Form of the capital budget
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 603.2 - Form of the capital budget

State Regulations

Capital budgets shall be prepared in accordance with
procedures and in the form required by the State University and the local
sponsor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
603.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
